title: Max makes toy train with labor, capital

content.question: Which of the following employment decisions should Max follow to use the least-cost combination of labor and capital to produce the current quantity of toy trains?

choices.label: Employment of Labor Employment of Capital Increase No change
Employment of Labor Employment of Capital Decrease Increase
Employment of Labor Employment of Capital Decrease Decrease
Employment of Labor Employment of Capital Increase Increase
Employment of Labor Employment of Capital Increase Decrease

content.answer: Employment of Labor Employment of Capital Increase Decrease
